title: AWS (Amazon Web Services)
subTitle: Leveraging cloud infrastructure to support business scalability and reliability
overviewContent: AWS has been used to deploy and manage web applications with a focus on high availability, security, and performance. Tasks include deploying applications to Elastic Beanstalk, configuring load balancers to distribute traffic efficiently across regions, setting up secure IAM roles, and implementing security policies. By optimising cloud infrastructure, users across different countries can access services reliably, and system performance is maintained at scale.

relatedProjects.projectName: H & H Lawyers Website and Server Migration
